verses.verse: Our soul is exceedingly filled With the scorn of those who are at ease, With the contempt of the proud.
The LORD the Defense of His People A Song of Ascents. Of David. [1] “If it had not been the LORD who was on our (Ps. 25:15) side,” (Ps. 118:6; (Rom. 8:31)) Let Israel now say—
“If it had not been the LORD who was on our side, When men rose up against us,
Then they would have (Ps. 129:1) swallowed us alive, When their wrath was kindled against us;
Then the waters would have overwhelmed us, The stream would have gone over our soul;
